body_html:
We are not supporting GPUs on macos anymore, because apple and nvidia do not provide official support for each other. I will mark this community support.
You may have better luck trying to get support for this from stackoverflow.

body:
We are not supporting GPUs on macos anymore, because apple and nvidia do not provide official support for each other. I will mark this community support.
You may have better luck trying to get support for this from stackoverflow.
